EmailTemplate.name: Breakfast Series Invite - Franklin TN
EmailTemplate.subject: Mark your calendar for a chance to give us your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
SAVE THE DATE October 23, 2006, 7:30 – 9 a.m. Franklin, TN
HAVE BREAKFAST WITH US!
American Student Assistance® is always looking for ways to incorporate your suggestions into our business.
What are our strengths? How can we improve? We want to hear from you!
So mark your calendars for an interactive feedback session. More information to come.
